ygData.subject: Re: Problem with instalation
ygData.msgSnippet: Sergey, Try adding -fPIC to the following line in configure CXXFLAGS=${CXXFLAGS:= -O0 -Wall } to CXXFLAGS=${CXXFLAGS:= -O0 -Wall -fPIC } -Tom ...

Sergey,

Try adding -fPIC to the following line in configure
CXXFLAGS=3D${C=
XXFLAGS:=3D"-O0 -Wall"}
to 
CXXFLAGS=3D${CXXFLAGS:=3D"-O0 -Wall -fPIC"}

-T=
om
